str2: Adverb from holos; completely, i.e. Altogether;, everywhere; not by any means.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Fornication, whoredom; met: idolatry. From porneuo; harlotry; figuratively, idolatry.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Fornication, whoredom; met: idolatry. From porneuo; harlotry; figuratively, idolatry.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
